languages.text:
After the wearer uses {g|f:7989c6e3109841329aee9e4546138395}Press the Advantage{/g}, if the wearer still has:
-<indent=5%>More than 5 {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks: the next attack ignores {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>More than 10 {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks: also ignores {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>More than 15 {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks: also ignores {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.</indent>
If the wearer already has the {g|f:402d4b8938fa491da2058c62a65047b8}Undisputed Advantage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}, then using {g|f:7989c6e3109841329aee9e4546138395}Press the Advantage{/g} will only spend 1/4 of the {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks instead of 1/2.

traits.locale_text: After the wearer uses Press the Advantage, if the wearer still has: - more than 5 tactical advantage stacks: the next attack ignores {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} - more than 10 tactical advantage stacks: also ignores {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} - more than 15 tactical advantage stacks: also ignores {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} If the wearer already has the Undisputed Advantage {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}, then using Press the Advantage will only spend 1/4 of the tactical advantage stacks instead of 1/2.

After the wearer uses Press the Advantage, if the wearer still has: -More than 5 tactical advantage stacks: the next attack ignores {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. -More than 10 tactical advantage stacks: also ignores {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}. -More than 15 tactical advantage stacks: also ignores {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. If the wearer already has the Undisputed Advantage {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}, then using Press the Advantage will only spend 1/4 of the tactical advantage stacks instead of 1/2.

After the wearer uses Press the Advantage, if the wearer still has: -More than 5 tactical advantage stacks: the next attack ignores {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. -More than 10 tactical advantage stacks: also ignores {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}. -More than 15 tactical advantage stacks: also ignores {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. If the wearer already has the Undisputed Advantage {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}, then using Press the Advantage will only spend 1/4 of the tactical advantage stacks instead of 1/2.

languages.text: Если при использовании {g|f:7989c6e3109841329aee9e4546138395}Дополнительного преимущества{/g} у персонажа остается... -... более 5 {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}тактических преимуществ{/g}: его следующая атака игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} цели. -... более 10 {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}тактических преимуществ{/g}: его следующая атака также игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытие{/g} цели. -... более 15 {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}тактических преимуществ{/g}: его следующая атака также игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} цели. Если у персонажа уже есть {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талант{/g} Неоспоримое преимущество, то при применении {g|f:7989c6e3109841329aee9e4546138395}Дополнительного преимущества{/g} будет потрачено только 1/4 {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}тактических преимуществ{/g}, а не 1/2.
languages.original_text: After the wearer uses {g|f:7989c6e3109841329aee9e4546138395}Press the Advantage{/g}, if the wearer still has: -More than 5 {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks: the next attack ignores {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. -More than 10 {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks: also ignores {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}. -More than 15 {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks: also ignores {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. If the wearer already has the Undisputed Advantage {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}, then using {g|f:7989c6e3109841329aee9e4546138395}Press the Advantage{/g} will only spend 1/4 of the {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks instead of 1/2.

traits.locale_text: Если при использовании {g|f:7989c6e3109841329aee9e4546138395}Дополнительного преимущества{/g} у персонажа остается... -... более 5 {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}тактических преимуществ{/g}: его следующая атака игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} цели. -... более 10 {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}тактических преимуществ{/g}: его следующая атака также игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытие{/g} цели. -... более 15 {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}тактических преимуществ{/g}: его следующая атака также игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} цели. Если у персонажа уже есть {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талант{/g} Неоспоримое преимущество, то при применении {g|f:7989c6e3109841329aee9e4546138395}Дополнительного преимущества{/g} будет потрачено только 1/4 {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}тактических преимуществ{/g}, а не 1/2.

Если при использовании Дополнительного преимущества у персонажа остается... -... более 5 тактических преимуществ: его следующая атака игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} цели -... более 10 тактических преимуществ: его следующая атака также игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытие{/g} цели -... более 15 тактических преимуществ: его следующая атака также игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонение{/g} цели Если у персонажа уже есть {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талант{/g} Неоспоримое преимущество , то при применении Дополнительного преимущества будет потрачено только 1/4 тактических преимуществ, а не 1/2.

languages.text:
当装备者使用{g|f:7989c6e3109841329aee9e4546138395}扩大优势{/g}之后，如果装备者仍有：
- <indent=5%>5层以上{g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}“战术优势”{/g}层数，则装备者下次攻击忽视目标{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}。</indent>
- <indent=5%>10层以上{g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}“战术优势”{/g}层数，则下次攻击还会额外忽视目标{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}效果。</indent>
- <indent=5%>15层以上{g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}“战术优势”{/g}层数，则下次攻击还会额外忽视目标{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}。</indent>
如果装备者拥有{g|f:402d4b8938fa491da2058c62a65047b8}绝对优势{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}，则{g|f:7989c6e3109841329aee9e4546138395}扩大优势{/g}不再消耗一半层数，只会消耗四分之一层数。
languages.original_text:
After the wearer uses {g|f:7989c6e3109841329aee9e4546138395}Press the Advantage{/g}, if the wearer still has:
-<indent=5%>More than 5 {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks: the next attack ignores {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>More than 10 {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks: also ignores {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>More than 15 {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks: also ignores {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.</indent>
If the wearer already has the {g|f:402d4b8938fa491da2058c62a65047b8}Undisputed Advantage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}, then using {g|f:7989c6e3109841329aee9e4546138395}Press the Advantage{/g} will only spend 1/4 of the {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks instead of 1/2.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者使用扩大优势之后，如果装备者仍有： - 5层以上“战术优势”层数，则装备者下次攻击忽视目标{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}。 - 10层以上“战术优势”层数，则下次攻击还会额外忽视目标{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}。 - 15层以上“战术优势”层数，则下次攻击还会额外忽视目标{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}。 如果装备者拥有绝对优势{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}，则扩大优势不再消耗一半层数，只会消耗四分之一层数。

languages.text: 使用者が優位の促進を使用した後、もし使用者に： -戦術的優位が5スタック以上ある場合、次の攻撃で{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g}を無視する。 -戦術的優位が10スタック以上ある場合、{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽物{/g}も無視する。 -戦術的優位が15スタック以上ある場合、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}も無視する。 使用者がすでに議論不要の優位の{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}才能{/g}を持っている場合、優位の促進を使用しても戦術的優位のスタックは1/2ではなく1/4しか消費されない。
languages.original_text: After the wearer uses Press the Advantage, if the wearer still has: -More than 5 tactical advantage stacks: the next attack ignores {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. -More than 10 tactical advantage stacks: also ignores {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}. -More than 15 tactical advantage stacks: also ignores {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. If the wearer already has the Undisputed Advantage {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}, then using Press the Advantage will only spend 1/4 of the tactical advantage stacks instead of 1/2.

traits.locale_text: 着用者が優位の促進を使用した後、もし着用者に： -戦術的優位が5スタック以上ある場合、次の攻撃では{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}を無視する -戦術的優位が10スタック以上ある場合、次の攻撃では{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}カバー{/g}も無視する -戦術的優位が15スタック以上ある場合、次の攻撃では{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}も無視する 着用者がすでに議論不要の優位の{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}才能{/g}を持っている場合、優位の促進を使用しても戦術的優位のスタックは1/2ではなく1/4しか消費されない。

languages.text:
Después de que el portador use {g|f:7989c6e3109841329aee9e4546138395}Tomar la delantera{/g}, si el portador aún tiene:
-<indent=5%>Más de 5 acumulaciones de {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Ventaja táctica{/g}: el siguiente ataque ignora el {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Más de 10 acumulaciones de {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Ventaja táctica{/g}: también ignora la {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Más de 15 acumulaciones de {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Ventaja táctica{/g}: también ignora la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g}.</indent>
Si el portador ya tiene el {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talento{/g} {g|f:402d4b8938fa491da2058c62a65047b8}Ventaja inapelable{/g}, usar {g|f:7989c6e3109841329aee9e4546138395}Tomar la delantera{/g} solo gastará 1/4 de las acumulaciones de {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Ventaja táctica{/g} en vez de la mitad.
languages.original_text:
After the wearer uses {g|f:7989c6e3109841329aee9e4546138395}Press the Advantage{/g}, if the wearer still has:
-<indent=5%>More than 5 {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks: the next attack ignores {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>More than 10 {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks: also ignores {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>More than 15 {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks: also ignores {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.</indent>
If the wearer already has the {g|f:402d4b8938fa491da2058c62a65047b8}Undisputed Advantage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}, then using {g|f:7989c6e3109841329aee9e4546138395}Press the Advantage{/g} will only spend 1/4 of the {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks instead of 1/2.

traits.locale_text: Después de que el portador use Tomar la delantera, si el portador aún tiene: - más de 5 acumulaciones de Ventaja táctica: el siguiente ataque ignora el {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} - más de 10 acumulaciones de Ventaja táctica: también ignora la {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g} - más de 15 acumulaciones de Ventaja táctica: también ignora la {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} Si el portador ya tiene el {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talento{/g} Ventaja inapelable, usar Tomar la delantera solo gastará 1/4 de las acumulaciones de Ventaja táctica en vez de la mitad.

languages.text:
Wenn der Träger {g|f:7989c6e3109841329aee9e4546138395}Den Vorteil ausweiten{/g} einsetzt und folgendes hat:
-<indent=5%> Mehr als 5 Stapel {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414} Taktischer Vorteil{/g}: Der nächste Angriff ignoriert {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%> Mehr als 10 Stapel {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414} Taktischer Vorteil{/g}: Ignoriert auch {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%> Mehr als 15 Stapel {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414} Taktischer Vorteil{/g}: Ignoriert {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}.</indent>
Wenn der Träger über das {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talent{/g} {g|f:402d4b8938fa491da2058c62a65047b8}Unangefochtener Vorteil{/g} verfügt, verbraucht der Einsatz von {g|f:7989c6e3109841329aee9e4546138395}Den Vorteil ausweiten{/g} nur ein Viertel anstatt der Hälfte der Stapel von {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414} Taktischer Vorteil{/g}.
languages.original_text:
After the wearer uses {g|f:7989c6e3109841329aee9e4546138395}Press the Advantage{/g}, if the wearer still has:
-<indent=5%>More than 5 {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks: the next attack ignores {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>More than 10 {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks: also ignores {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>More than 15 {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks: also ignores {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.</indent>
If the wearer already has the {g|f:402d4b8938fa491da2058c62a65047b8}Undisputed Advantage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}, then using {g|f:7989c6e3109841329aee9e4546138395}Press the Advantage{/g} will only spend 1/4 of the {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks instead of 1/2.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem der Träger Den Vorteil ausweiten nutzt, falls der Träger noch über Folgendes verfügt: - Mehr als 5 Additionen von Taktischer Vorteil: Der nächste Angriff ignoriert {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} - Mehr als 5 Additionen von Taktischer Vorteil: Ignoriert ebenfalls {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} - Mehr als 15 Additionen von Taktischer Vorteil: Ignoriert {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} Wenn der Träger über das {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talent{/g} Unangefochtener Vorteil verfügt, verbraucht die Nutzung von Den Vorteil ausweiten nur ein Viertel anstatt der Hälfte der Additionen von Taktischer Vorteil.

languages.text:
Une fois que l'utilisateur a eu recours à {g|f:7989c6e3109841329aee9e4546138395}Exploitation de l'avantage{/g}, s'il possède encore :
-<indent=5%>Plus de 5 cumuls d'{g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Avantage tactique{/g} : l'attaque suivante ignore la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Plus de 10 cumuls d'{g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Avantage tactique{/g} : ignore également la {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Plus de 15 cumuls d'{g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Avantage tactique{/g} : ignore également l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g}.</indent>
Si l'utilisateur possède déjà le {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} {g|f:402d4b8938fa491da2058c62a65047b8}Avantage incontesté{/g}, l'utilisation d'{g|f:7989c6e3109841329aee9e4546138395}Exploitation de l'avantage{/g} entraîne une dépense d'un quart des cumuls d'{g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Avantage tactique{/g} au lieu de la moitié.
languages.original_text:
After the wearer uses {g|f:7989c6e3109841329aee9e4546138395}Press the Advantage{/g}, if the wearer still has:
-<indent=5%>More than 5 {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks: the next attack ignores {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>More than 10 {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks: also ignores {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>More than 15 {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks: also ignores {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.</indent>
If the wearer already has the {g|f:402d4b8938fa491da2058c62a65047b8}Undisputed Advantage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}, then using {g|f:7989c6e3109841329aee9e4546138395}Press the Advantage{/g} will only spend 1/4 of the {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks instead of 1/2.

traits.locale_text: Une fois l'utilisateur a eu recours à Exploitation de l'Avantage, s'il possède encore : - plus de 5 cumuls d'Avantage Tactique : l'attaque suivante ignore la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} - plus de 10 cumuls d'Avantage Tactique : ignore également la {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture{/g} - plus de 15 cumuls d'Avantage Tactique : ignore également l'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} Si l'utilisateur possède déjà le {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} Avantage Incontesté, l'utilisation d'Exploitation de l'Avantage entraîne une dépense d'à peine un quart des cumuls d'Avantage Tactique au lieu de la moitié.

languages.text:
Takan kişi {g|f:7989c6e3109841329aee9e4546138395}Avantaja Yüklen{/g} kabiliyeti kullandığında hâlâ şunlara sahipse:
-<indent=5%>5'ten fazla {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}taktiksel avantaj{/g} birikimi: Bir sonraki saldırı, {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırmayı{/g} yok sayar.</indent>
-<indent=5%>10'dan fazla {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}taktiksel avantaj{/g} birikimi: Ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}siperi{/g} de yok sayar.</indent>
-<indent=5%>15'ten fazla {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}taktiksel avantaj{/g} birikimi: Ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınmayı{/g} da yok sayar.</indent>
Takan kişi zaten {g|f:402d4b8938fa491da2058c62a65047b8}Tartışmasız Avantaj{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}becerisine{/g} sahipse {g|f:7989c6e3109841329aee9e4546138395}Avantaja Yüklen{/g} kabiliyeti, 1/2 yerine sadece 1/4 {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}taktiksel avantaj{/g} birikimi harcar.
languages.original_text:
After the wearer uses {g|f:7989c6e3109841329aee9e4546138395}Press the Advantage{/g}, if the wearer still has:
-<indent=5%>More than 5 {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks: the next attack ignores {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>More than 10 {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks: also ignores {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>More than 15 {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks: also ignores {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.</indent>
If the wearer already has the {g|f:402d4b8938fa491da2058c62a65047b8}Undisputed Advantage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}, then using {g|f:7989c6e3109841329aee9e4546138395}Press the Advantage{/g} will only spend 1/4 of the {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks instead of 1/2.

traits.locale_text:
Takan kişi {g|f:7989c6e3109841329aee9e4546138395}Avantaja Yüklen{/g} kabiliyeti kullandığında hâlâ şunlara sahipse:
-<indent=5%>5'ten fazla {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}taktiksel avantaj{/g} birikimi: Bir sonraki saldırı, {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırmayı{/g} yok sayar.</indent>
-<indent=5%>10'dan fazla {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}taktiksel avantaj{/g} birikimi: Ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}siperi{/g} de yok sayar.</indent>
-<indent=5%>15'ten fazla {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}taktiksel avantaj{/g} birikimi: Ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınmayı{/g} da yok sayar.</indent>
Takan kişi zaten {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Taktiksel Avantaj{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}becerisine{/g} sahipse {g|f:7989c6e3109841329aee9e4546138395}Avantaja Yüklen{/g} kabiliyeti, 1/2 yerine sadece 1/4 {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}taktiksel avantaj{/g} birikimi harcar.
